title: Sustainable co-production of carbon quantum dots and activated carbon from natural rubber latex for the inhibition of pathogenic microorganisms and removal of pharmaceutical residues.
abstract: This study demonstrates a sustainable and integrated method for the co-production of carbon quantum dots (CQDs) and activated carbon (AC) using natural rubber (NR) latex, which is a renewable and widely available biomass. CQDs were synthesized
clean_text: sustainable co production of carbon quantum dots and activated carbon from natural rubber latex for the inhibition of pathogenic microorganisms and removal of pharmaceutical residues this study demonstrates a sustainable and integrated method for the co production of carbon quantum dots cqds and activated carbon ac using natural rubber nr latex which is a renewable and widely available biomass cqds were synthesized
